    • entropy.configuration.SimpleNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Object
implements Node, Cloneable
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleNode

        public SimpleNode(String name)
        Make a node without specifying any capacity.
        Parameters:
        name - the identifier of the node

      • SimpleNode

        public SimpleNode(String name,
          int nbOfCPUs,
          int coreCapa,
          int memoryCapacity)
        Make a node and specify its resource capacity
        Parameters:
        name - the identifier of the node
        nbOfCPUs - the number of physical CPUs available to the VMs
        coreCapa - the capacity of each physical CPU
        memoryCapacity - the memory capacity of each node

      • SimpleNode

        public SimpleNode(String name,
          int nbOfCPUs,
          int coreCapa,
          int memoryCapacity,
          String ip,
          String mac)
        Make a node and specify its resource capacity
        Parameters:
        name - the identifier of the node
        nbOfCPUs - the number of physical CPUs available to the VMs
        coreCapa - the capacity of each physical CPU
        memoryCapacity - the memory capacity of each node
        ip - the IP address of the node
        mac - the MAC address of the node

      • SimpleNode

        public SimpleNode(String name,
          String physicalName,
          int nbCPU,
          int coreCapa,
          int capaMem)
        Make a node and specify its resource capacity
        Parameters:
        name - the identifier of the node
        physicalName - the identifier of the physical node (if they are different node == virtual node)
        nbOfCPUs - the number of physical CPUs available to the VMs
        coreCapacity - the capacity of each physical CPU
        memoryCapacity - the memory capacity of each node
